docfx/api/WsusManager.App.Views.html.title: Namespace WsusManager.App.Views | WSUS Manager
docfx/api/WsusManager.App.Views.html.summary: Namespace WsusManager.App.Views Classes GpoInstructionsDialog Dialog displaying GPO deployment instructions with copyable text. Shown after GPO files are successfully copied to C:\WSUS\WSUS GPO. InstallDialog Install WSUS dialog. Collects installer path, SA username, and SA password before installation begins. Returns InstallOptions via public property. MainWindow Main application window. Constructor-only code-behind that sets DataContext from the DI-injected ViewModel. Minimal code-behind for UI-only concerns. ScheduleTaskDialog Schedule Task dialog. Collects all scheduling parameters: task name, schedule type, day, time, maintenance profile, and credentials. Returns ScheduledTaskOptions via public property. SettingsDialog Settings dialog. Allows administrators to edit server mode, refresh interval, content path, SQL instance, and theme selection without restarting the application. Returns updated AppSettings via the Result property when DialogResult is true. SyncProfileDialog Sync profile selection dialog. Returns the selected SyncProfile via the SelectedProfile property. TransferDialog Transfer dialog for Export/Import operations. Collects all parameters before operation begins -- no interactive prompts during execution.

docfx/api/WsusManager.App.html.title: Namespace WsusManager.App | WSUS Manager
docfx/api/WsusManager.App.html.summary: Namespace WsusManager.App Classes App WPF Application class. Handles global unhandled exception handlers. DI host and window creation are managed in Program.cs. Program Application entry point. Sets up the DI host, resolves the main window, and runs the WPF application. All service dependencies are registered here.

docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Models.html.title: Namespace WsusManager.Core.Models | WSUS Manager
docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Models.html.summary: Namespace WsusManager.Core.Models Classes AppSettings Application settings model. Serialized to/from JSON at %APPDATA%\WsusManager\settings.json. Survives close/reopen cycles. ClientDiagnosticResult Snapshot of WSUS client configuration and state on a remote host, gathered from the Windows Update registry hive, service control manager, and WMI. ConnectivityTestResult Result of a network connectivity test from the client host to the WSUS server. Ports are tested with a TCP connection attempt; latency is measured via ping. DashboardData Holds all data collected during a dashboard refresh cycle. Populated by IDashboardService.CollectAsync(). DiagnosticCheckResult Result of a single health check. Each check has a name, status, detail message, and optional repair outcome if auto-repair was attempted. DiagnosticReport Aggregate result of a full diagnostics run. Contains all individual check results and computed summary statistics. Immutable â€” created once after all checks complete. ExportOptions Options for WSUS content export operations. ImportOptions Options for WSUS content import operations. InstallOptions Options for the WSUS + SQL Server Express installation wizard. All fields are collected via the GUI dialog before installation begins. OperationResult Represents the result of a service operation. Every public service method returns this type instead of throwing exceptions for expected failures. Exceptions are reserved for programming errors only. OperationResult<T> Generic version of OperationResult that includes a data payload. ProcessResult Result of an external process execution. ScheduledTaskOptions Options for creating a Windows scheduled task for WSUS maintenance. All fields are collected via the ScheduleTaskDialog before task creation. ServiceStatusInfo Status snapshot of a Windows service at a point in time. SyncResult Result of a WSUS synchronization operation. WsusErrorCodes Static dictionary of common WSUS and Windows Update error codes with descriptions and recommended fixes. Used by the error-code lookup feature (CLI-06). Keys are uppercase hex codes without the "0x" prefix (e.g., "80244010"). The Lookup(string?) method accepts either format. WsusErrorInfo Decoded information for a WSUS or Windows Update error code. Sourced from the WsusErrorCodes static dictionary. Enums CheckStatus Status of a single diagnostic check. ScheduleType Schedule frequency for a Windows scheduled task. SyncProfile Sync profile selection for Online Sync operations. Matches legacy PowerShell MaintenanceProfile parameter.

docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Services.Inte.title: Interface IDeepCleanupService | WSUS Manager
docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Services.Inte.summary: Interface IDeepCleanupService Orchestrates the full 6-step WSUS deep cleanup pipeline. Steps match the PowerShell WsusDatabase.psm1 implementation: WSUS built-in cleanup (Invoke-WsusServerCleanup via PowerShell) Remove supersession records for declined updates Remove supersession records for superseded updates (10k batches) Delete declined updates via spDeleteUpdate (100/batch) Rebuild fragmented indexes + update statistics Shrink database (3 retries on backup-block). Declaration Task<OperationResult> RunAsync(string sqlInstance, IProgress<string> progress, CancellationToken ct) Parameters Type Name Description string sqlInstance SQL Server instance (e.g., "localhost\SQLEXPRESS"). IProgress<string> progress Progress reporter for real-time status lines. CancellationToken ct Cancellation token. Returns Type Description Task<OperationResult> OperationResult indicating success or failure.

docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Services.Inte.title: Namespace WsusManager.Core.Services.Interfaces | WSUS Manager
docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Services.Inte.summary: Namespace WsusManager.Core.Services.Interfaces Interfaces IClientService Provides client machine management operations for WSUS-managed endpoints. All remote operations use WinRM (Invoke-Command) to execute PowerShell on the target host. If WinRM is unavailable, callers should direct users to the Script Generator in Phase 15. IContentResetService Runs wsusutil.exe reset to re-verify WSUS content files against the database. Used after air-gap database import to fix "content is still downloading" status. No timeout is applied â€” wsusutil reset can take 10+ minutes on large content stores. IDashboardService Collects system state data for the dashboard: service statuses, database size, disk space, scheduled task status, and connectivity. All queries are async and non-blocking. IDatabaseBackupService Provides backup and restore operations for the WSUS SUSDB database. All operations require SQL sysadmin permissions (hard-blocked otherwise). IDeepCleanupService Orchestrates the full 6-step WSUS deep cleanup pipeline. Steps match the PowerShell WsusDatabase.psm1 implementation: WSUS built-in cleanup (Invoke-WsusServerCleanup via PowerShell) Remove supersession records for declined updates Remove supersession records for superseded updates (10k batches) Delete declined updates via spDeleteUpdate (100/batch) Rebuild fragmented indexes + update statistics Shrink database (3 retries on backup-block). IExportService Exports WSUS content to external media. Supports full export (all content) and differential export (files modified within N days with Year/Month archive structure). Both modes use IRobocopyService for content copy. IFirewallService Manages WSUS firewall rules for ports 8530 (HTTP) and 8531 (HTTPS). Uses netsh advfirewall commands via IProcessRunner for compatibility with all Windows Server versions (no managed firewall API required). IGpoDeploymentService Service for copying GPO deployment files from the application's DomainController/ directory to C:\WSUS\WSUS GPO\ and returning step-by-step instructions for the DC admin. IHealthService Orchestrates the full diagnostics pipeline. Runs all health checks sequentially, streams each result to the progress reporter in real time, and automatically attempts repairs for fixable issues. Returns a complete DiagnosticReport. IImportService Imports WSUS content from external media (USB drive, network share) to the local WSUS content directory. Uses IRobocopyService for file copy and optionally runs content reset via IContentResetService after import. IInstallationService Service for installing WSUS with SQL Server Express. Validates prerequisites and launches the legacy PowerShell install script in non-interactive mode with parameters collected via the GUI dialog. IPermissionsService Checks and repairs WSUS content directory permissions and SQL login permissions. Content path checks verify NETWORK SERVICE and IIS_IUSRS ACLs. SQL checks query server role membership and login existence. IRobocopyService Runs robocopy.exe with standardized WSUS export/import options. Mirrors the PowerShell Invoke-WsusRobocopy function: /E /XO /MT:16 /R:2 /W:5 /NP /NDL, excludes *.bak *.log files and Logs SQLDB Backup directories. Interprets robocopy exit codes correctly (0-7 = success, 8+ = error). IScheduledTaskService Service for managing Windows scheduled tasks for WSUS maintenance. Uses schtasks.exe via IProcessRunner for task creation, querying, and deletion. IScriptGeneratorService Generates self-contained PowerShell scripts for WSUS client operations. Use this service when WinRM is unavailable on a target host â€” the generated script can be copied to the target and run manually as Administrator. ISettingsService Persists and loads application settings from %APPDATA%\WsusManager\settings.json. ISqlService Centralized SQL execution service for all WSUS database operations. Manages connection string construction, TrustServerCertificate handling, and timeout configuration. All methods accept CancellationToken and configurable CommandTimeout (0 = unlimited for maintenance queries). ISyncService Orchestrates the full Online Sync workflow using IWsusServerService. Three profiles match legacy PowerShell behavior: Full Sync: synchronize -> decline -> approve -> monitor downloads Quick Sync: synchronize -> approve (skip decline) Sync Only: synchronize metadata only. IWindowsServiceManager Manages Windows service lifecycle for WSUS-related services. Handles dependency ordering (SQL first, then IIS, then WSUS for start; reverse for stop). All methods return OperationResult â€” they do not throw for expected service failures. IWsusServerService Service for connecting to and operating on the local WSUS server via the Microsoft.UpdateServices.Administration managed API. The API assembly ships with the WSUS role and is loaded at runtime via Assembly.LoadFrom to avoid compile-time dependencies on machines without WSUS installed.

docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Services.WinR.title: Class WinRmExecutor | WSUS Manager
docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Services.WinR.summary: Class WinRmExecutor Executes PowerShell commands on remote hosts using WinRM (Invoke-Command). Delegates to IProcessRunner to invoke powershell.exe. WinRM availability note: WinRM is not guaranteed to be enabled on target hosts, especially in locked-down environments. Every method returns a graceful error result if the connection fails rather than throwing. Callers should direct users to the Script Generator (Phase 15) when WinRM is unavailable. docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Services.Wind.summary: Class WindowsServiceManager Manages Windows services for WSUS using System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController. Service dependency order for start: SQL(1) -> IIS(2) -> WSUS(3). Service dependency order for stop: WSUS(1) -> IIS(2) -> SQL(3). docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Services.html.title: Namespace WsusManager.Core.Services | WSUS Manager
docfx/api/WsusManager.Core.Services.html.summary: Namespace WsusManager.Core.Services Classes ClientService Implements remote WSUS client management operations via WinRM. All remote operations check WinRM availability before executing and return clear failure messages when the target is unreachable. ContentResetService Runs wsusutil.exe reset via IProcessRunner to re-verify content files. The wsusutil executable is located at C:\Program Files\Update Services\Tools\wsusutil.exe. Output is streamed to the progress reporter. No timeout is applied. DashboardService Collects dashboard data from the local system: Windows services, SQL database size, disk space, scheduled task status, and internet connectivity. All queries use async patterns and timeouts to avoid blocking the UI. DatabaseBackupService Implements database backup and restore operations for the WSUS SUSDB. Backup uses SQL BACKUP DATABASE with compression. Restore uses the full workflow: verify, stop services, single-user, restore, multi-user, wsusutil postinstall, restart services. Both operations require SQL sysadmin permissions. DeepCleanupService Implements the 6-step WSUS deep cleanup pipeline. Matches the PowerShell WsusDatabase.psm1 implementation exactly, including SQL batch sizes, retry logic, and progress format. ExportService Exports WSUS content to external media using robocopy. Supports full and differential export modes. FirewallService Firewall rule management via netsh advfirewall commands. Checks for and creates inbound rules on WSUS ports 8530 (HTTP) and 8531 (HTTPS). GpoDeploymentService Copies GPO deployment files from the application's DomainController/ directory to C:\WSUS\WSUS GPO\ and returns structured instruction text for the DC admin. HealthService Orchestrates the full 12-check diagnostics pipeline matching the PowerShell Invoke-WsusDiagnostics check list. Auto-repair is always on (matches GUI behavior). Each check streams its result to the progress reporter as it completes. ImportService Imports WSUS content from external media to the local WSUS content directory. InstallationService Validates installation prerequisites and launches the legacy Install-WsusWithSqlExpress.ps1 script via IProcessRunner in non-interactive mode. This is the only operation that deliberately shells out to PowerShell -- the install script is complex and re-implementing in C# provides no benefit. PermissionsService Checks and repairs WSUS content directory permissions and SQL login permissions. Content permissions use System.Security.AccessControl for checking and icacls for repair. SQL checks use Microsoft.Data.SqlClient with integrated security (Integrated Security=True). RobocopyService Runs robocopy.exe with standardized WSUS options for content transfer. Mirrors the PowerShell Invoke-WsusRobocopy function exactly. ScheduledTaskService Creates, queries, and deletes Windows scheduled tasks using schtasks.exe via IProcessRunner. Uses schtasks.exe instead of COM TaskScheduler API -- simpler, no NuGet dependency, and works reliably on Server 2019. ScriptGeneratorService Generates self-contained PowerShell scripts for WSUS client operations. Each generated script: Requires administrator privileges (#Requires -RunAsAdministrator) Is fully self-contained with no module imports or external dependencies Uses Write-Host with colours for readable output Ends with a "Press Enter" pause so the admin can read results. SettingsService Settings service that persists application settings to JSON at %APPDATA%\WsusManager\settings.json. SqlService Centralized SQL execution service for WSUS database operations. All connection strings use Integrated Security and TrustServerCertificate. Operations with commandTimeoutSeconds = 0 run with unlimited timeout â€” required for maintenance queries (index rebuild, shrink, batch deletes). SyncService Orchestrates Online Sync workflows by composing IWsusServerService operations according to the selected sync profile. WinRmExecutor Executes PowerShell commands on remote hosts using WinRM (Invoke-Command). Delegates to IProcessRunner to invoke powershell.exe. WinRM availability note: WinRM is not guaranteed to be enabled on target hosts, especially in locked-down environments. Every method returns a graceful error result if the connection fails rather than throwing. Callers should direct users to the Script Generator (Phase 15) when WinRM is unavailable. WindowsServiceManager Manages Windows services for WSUS using System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController. Service dependency order for start: SQL(1) -> IIS(2) -> WSUS(3). Service dependency order for stop: WSUS(1) -> IIS(2) -> SQL(3). Retry logic: 3 attempts with 5-second delays for service start failures. WsusServerService Connects to the local WSUS server via the Microsoft.UpdateServices.Administration managed API loaded at runtime. All WSUS API calls are blocking, so they are wrapped in Task.Run to keep the UI responsive.

docfx/api/index.html.title: WSUS Manager API Reference | WSUS Manager
docfx/api/index.html.summary: WSUS Manager API Reference Welcome to the WSUS Manager API documentation. This site provides comprehensive reference documentation for all public APIs in WsusManager.Core and WsusManager.App. Getting Started WsusManager.Core - Core library with business logic, services, and models WsusManager.App - WPF application with ViewModels and Views Key Namespaces WsusManager.Core.Services Service interfaces and implementations for WSUS operations: IHealthService - Health check and diagnostics ISqlService - SQL Server operations (cleanup, restore) ISyncService - WSUS synchronization operations IWindowsServiceManager - Windows service management IFirewallService - Firewall rule management IClientService - WinRM client operations IDatabaseBackupService - Database backup and restore IDeepCleanupService - Deep database cleanup and optimization IExportService - Export operations for air-gap transfers IImportService - Import operations for air-gap transfers WsusManager.Core.Models Data models for WSUS entities: OperationResult - Standard operation result ProcessResult - Process execution result DashboardData - Dashboard information AppSettings - Application settings DiagnosticCheckResult - Individual diagnostic check result DiagnosticReport - Complete diagnostic report ExportOptions - Export operation options ImportOptions - Import operation options SyncProfile - Sync configuration profiles SyncResult - Synchronization result WsusManager.App.ViewModels MVVM view models for UI logic: MainViewModel - Main application view model SettingsViewModel - Settings dialog view model DiagnosticsViewModel - Diagnostics panel view model Architecture WSUS Manager follows the MVVM pattern with CommunityToolkit.Mvvm: Models (WsusManager.Core) - Business entities Services (WsusManager.Core) - Business logic and external operations ViewModels (WsusManager.App) - UI state and commands Views (WsusManager.App) - XAML UI definition Version Current API documentation is for WSUS Manager v4.4.0.
